metadata.title: CVE-2016-10255 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The __libelf_set_rawdata_wrlock function in elf_getdata.c in elfutilsbefore 0.168 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash)via a crafted (1) sh_off or (2) sh_size ELF header value, which triggers amemory allocation failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.168-0.2
libasm1 - 0.168-0.2
libdw1 - 0.168-0.2
libelf1 - 0.168-0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.168-0.2').
